 alPHA
Alphah looked him and smiled "then I'm ready"said while she showed a sort of guns and some darts, some of them was red and the others was blue.
  black_ben14 <black_ben14@...> wrote: "Well of course if one of us goes in battle everybody go."replied 
Pegatron to cheer her up.
